title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Designing a Tutoring System Integrating Collaborative Learning Processes

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Digital Tool Competency and Collaborative Project Execution Experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish language project plans by utilizing a tutoring system and process scaffolding in collaborative learning.

Learners will use digital collaboration tools (Notion, Trello, Jira) to clearly assign roles in ≥3-member team projects, achieve ≥80% weekly task progress rates, and perform a monitoring process recording delays in an issue tracker within 24 hours.
Learners can improve project deliverables by utilizing feedback systems (human/pedagogical agents).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
